column5: Any help would be appreciated. Been trying for a while now.It tells the file is too big to download as an attachment.even with one picture.

You can do one of two things, don't know what you are running but right click and see if you have the option to resize pic, if you do resize and load that one. Or you could use a webs site called photobucket (it's free) and it does it for you, then it's as easy as copying and pasteing.
Thanks got them to photobucket..How do I get them the the post. INsert IMage? or add an attachment? What do I copy and paste? As you can tell I am new at all this
While on Photobucket in your album under each photo are four tags. Copy and paste IMG tag to your post it's that easy
